This package has a single function that computes the average of two numbers https://github.com/KwatMDPhD/GeometryExtension.jl/blob/bdcebaf3d62569852246c71364d0942edbcb5bfa/src/get_center.jl#L1-L5.
From the name I thought it somehow extended GeometryBasics.jl
